author: cms-sw
body: RPM 4.18 and above now user new tool `rpmuncompress` for unpacking the sources. It does not allow to override build-in macros e.g. `__unzip`. This break the build of oracle client as multiple sources provide same directory and without `unzip -o` it hangs. This PR proposes to explicitly use `%{__unzip} -o` instead of `%setup`
title: [el9][oracle] explicitly use unzip instead of setup
